scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run db:generate && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
